original_text: Then Shem and Japheth took Noah's coat and they put it between their shoulders. They walked into Noah's tent with their backs to Noah. In this way they covered their father with the coat. They looked away from their father so that they did not see him. They did this because Noah was not wearing any clothes.
korean_text: 셈과 야벳이 옷을 가져다가 자기들의 어깨에 메고 뒷걸음쳐 들어가서 그들의 아버지의 하체를 덮었으며 그들이 얼굴을 돌이키고 그들의 아버지의 하체를 보지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Shem and Japheth took Noah's coat
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 셈과 야벳은 노아의 겉옷을 가져다가

sentences.original_text: and they put it between their shoulders
In this way they covered their father
They looked away from their father
so that they did not see him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 보지 않도록 하기 위함이었습니다

sentences.original_text: They did this because Noah was not wearing any clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이렇게 한 것은 노아가 옷을 입지 않았기 때문이었습니다
